originalText.text: My kids have attended summer camp, 5 day preschool, and a variety of enrichment programs including ukulele lessons and after school art club at My Little Village. MLV has a warm, nurturing environment with teachers who care and are passionate about their work.  My daughter is thriving in the classroom, making friends, and overall is very happy there.  We highly recommend this school.

text.text: My kids have attended summer camp, 5 day preschool, and a variety of enrichment programs including ukulele lessons and after school art club at My Little Village. MLV has a warm, nurturing environment with teachers who care and are passionate about their work.  My daughter is thriving in the classroom, making friends, and overall is very happy there.  We highly recommend this school.

originalText.text: I currently have two girls in MLV, and while I have no other pre-K school to compare it to, I can still say that my wife and I are very happy with our choice.  Over the past two years, we have had the privilege of belonging to a loving community of parents and teachers.  Each teacher has a fun personality, and they all share an unparalleled amount of patience and knowledge when it comes to child care.  My kids will miss them.

originalText.text: We feel incredibly blessed to have found My Little Village. The love, care and curriculum that they have for all of the children supersedes that of any other school we looked at in the area and beyond. Our son has been with MLV since he was two years old and has loved every second of his time there. I cannot recommend this day care/ pre-school more highly.

originalText.text: Amazing place! My 3 year old daughter loves it and spends the weekend asking when is it school day again:) the teachers and directors are all lovely, warm and welcoming. The kids are free to explore while learning and developing. My daughter also does Capoeira there and loves it.

originalText.text: Best School. Best Team. A thoughtful, safe, loving, kind, creative, diverse, collaborative, smart environment and curriculum for young children to grow and learn. We can't imagine sending our daughter anywhere else. We LOVE MLV!
